scripts.test:authorizationfromintake: npx playwright test authorization.spec.ts --headed --grep @createandadd> terminal.log 2>&1 & npx ts-node utils/mail.ts
scripts.test:authorizationfromclient: npx playwright test authorization.spec.ts --headed --grep @addfromexist> terminal.log 2>&1 & npx ts-node utils/mail.ts
scripts.test:duplicateauthnum: npx playwright test authorization.spec.ts --headed --grep @addduplicate> terminal.log 2>&1 & npx ts-node utils/mail.ts
